text: The Ignorance of Blood () is a 2014 Spanish thriller movie directed by Manuel Gómez Pereira and was based on the novel of the same name by Robert Wilson. It stars Juan Diego Botto, Paz Vega, Vladimir Cruz, Rocío Borrallo, Francesc Garrido and Alberto San Juan. ==Other websites== * * Category:2014 thriller movies Category:Spanish thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Manuel Gómez Pereira Category:Movies set in Madrid
title: The Ignorance of Blood (movie)
